snippet: The Fox network and television studio said they would delay the start of production on the new season of “Glee,” as well as the premiere date, after the death of the cast member Cory Monteith.
abstract: The Fox network and television studio said they would delay the start of production on the new season of “Glee,” as well as the premiere date, after the death of the cast member Cory Monteith.

headline.main: Fox Delays Production and Premiere of 'Glee'
headline.print_headline: Fox Delays Production and Premiere of ‘Glee’
